name: Obsidian Beast - Stargazer
text: FLIP: Send 1 "Obsidian Beast" card from your Deck to your GY. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You can only use 1 effect of "Obsidian Beast - Stargazer" per turn and only once that turn.
